title: Our Journey Into The World Of AI
description: Sidd and Avyay share their experiences with Databricks, the development of a matching algorithm, highlighting data importance, project evolution, and tools like Langchain and Ollama. This inaugural episode sets the stage for The Moving Target podcast.
keyTakeaways: The importance of data quality in AI projects cannot be overstated.
Matching algorithms require iterative development and refinement.
Tools like Langchain and Ollama are becoming essential in the AI toolkit.
Real-world AI projects evolve significantly from initial concepts.
Databricks provides powerful infrastructure for AI development.

showNotes.topic: Our backgrounds and how we got into AI
Tools we use: Langchain and Ollama
